testcase.error:
org.mockito.exceptions.misusing.InvalidUseOfMatchersException: Invalid use of argument matchers! 2 matchers expected, 1 recorded: -> at com.TaskDemo.Task.TaskControllerApiTest.updateTask_success(TaskControllerApiTest.java:148)
This exception may occur if matchers are combined with raw values: //incorrect: someMethod(any(), "raw String"); When using matchers, all arguments have to be provided by matchers. For example: //correct: someMethod(any(), eq("String by matcher"));
For more info see javadoc for Matchers class.
